I would recommend "Divergent" and "Training Day". Both have great plotlines and well-developed characters.
"Divergent" follows a young girl named Tris who discovers she is Divergent, an anomaly that disrupts the flow of human experience. This discovery puts Tris on a dangerous path as she tries to uncover the true nature of her own anomaly.
"Divergent" stars Emma Watson as Tris and璧儿·李斯特（Bella Liest）饰演艾迪，是Tris的弟弟也是Divergent的一员。
Training Day follows two veteran police officers, Denzel Washington and Ethan Hawke, as they train a new recruit, Scott Glenn. The film explores the challenges that come with training new recruits and the impact that this has on both the new recruit and the experienced trainers.
Training Day stars Denzel Washington as Captain Daniel "Danny" Sweeney, an experienced police captain who trains new recruits; Ethan Hawke as Detective David "Dave" Murphy, an experienced police detective who trains new recruits; Scott Glenn as William "Will" Foster, a new police recruit who is being trained by Captain Sweeney and Detective Murphy.

- Title: Super (2010) | Plot: Ryan is young and full of imaginative enthusiasm. He loves superheroes and spends his days moving from one adventure to the next with his two best friends.
